---
title: "The future of Open Science "
date: today
---

::: {.callout-tip}
### Learning Objectives

By the end of this session, learners will be able to:

- Provide an overview of the implementation of Open Science principles into their own workflow
- Discuss future benefits and challenges that come with the implementation of Open Science principles in Sweden

:::
